response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you is $150, I propose a fair price of $125 for it. This offer allows you to acquire the product at a reasonable premium while ensuring I receive a fair compensation for my efforts and resources invested into it. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 125}
